name: Steven SZAREWICZ, and Other Similarly Situated Pennsylvanians, Appellant v. Governor Edward RENDELL, and Former Governor Thomas Ridge, Appellees

parties: Steven SZAREWICZ, and Other Similarly Situated Pennsylvanians, Appellant v. Governor Edward RENDELL, and Former Governor Thomas Ridge, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
952 A.2d 1170
Steven SZAREWICZ, and Other Similarly Situated Pennsylvanians, Appellant v. Governor Edward RENDELL, and Former Governor Thomas Ridge, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 18, 2008.
